title: Banana apricot nut cake
ingredients: ['250g self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '4 tablespoons light muscovado sugar', '6 tablespoons sunflower oil', '6 tablespoons semi-skimmed milk', '2 eggs', '2 large ripe bananas, peeled and mashed with a fork', '120g dried apricots, chopped', '6 tablespoons chopped pecan nuts or walnuts']
